name: Cuaba - 2012 Coleccion Habanos - Bariay
additionalNotes:
Cuaba is a current post-Revolution brand introduced in 1996, specifically to produce Figurado shaped cigars. It is classified in Habanos SA's 'Other' group of their portfolio bands. In the pre-2019 classification system it was a niche brand. When first introduced, Cuaba was considered to be a premium 
At the start Cuaba offered just comparatively small sizes. Divinos, Tradicionales, Generosos and Exclusivos. Since 2003, three much larger vitolas, Distinguido, Diadema and Salomón, have been released as part of the standard range.
